channel.title: How do I change color of font on my signature?
channel.description: Yeah, pretty much... It's not shcweet like others... and it's not like myspace where you type <red> or <green> or any of that stuff =p So yeah... Help and... You'll get a hug and a thumbs up =]

item.title: How do I change color of font on my signature?

item.description:

Just fill in the … for the color.
